about_the_game:
Kill the God is a first-person action adventure with a simplistic pixel art style, where you use primarily melee/close range weapons to take down big boss monsters to discover who you once were and who wronged you in the past.
In Kill the God, you can find weapons and equipment to enhance your abilities. Most of the games progression is linear but any challenge could be tackled with any gear you desire. Want to be an all out tank to ignore damage? Want to ruthlessly combo foes until the fall in record time? Or maybe even do joke/challenge runs using objectively terrible tools to showcase your raw skill? With this game, all of the above and more is possible in this intense boss rush game.

Kill the God is a first-person action adventure with a simplistic pixel art style, where you use primarily melee/close range weapons to take down big boss monsters to discover who you once were and who wronged you in the past.
In Kill the God, you can find weapons and equipment to enhance your abilities. Most of the games progression is linear but any challenge could be tackled with any gear you desire. Want to be an all out tank to ignore damage? Want to ruthlessly combo foes until the fall in record time? Or maybe even do joke/challenge runs using objectively terrible tools to showcase your raw skill? With this game, all of the above and more is possible in this intense boss rush game.
name: Kill The God

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N4120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Game may act differently on lower end systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650ti
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A action filled pixel art first person hack n' slash with many bosses, items and story points. Play as the fallen god of speed to reclaim what you had wrongfully revoked.
